searchParam.name: active
searchParam.documentation: A server defined search that may match any of the string fields in the Address, including line, city, state, country, postalCode, and/or text

searchParam.name: address
searchParam.documentation: A (part of the) address of the organization

searchParam.name: address-city
searchParam.documentation: A city specified in an address

searchParam.name: address-country
searchParam.documentation: A country specified in an address

searchParam.name: address-postalcode
searchParam.documentation: A postal code specified in an address

searchParam.name: address-state
searchParam.documentation: A state specified in an address

searchParam.name: address-use
searchParam.documentation: A use code specified in an address

searchParam.name: contactName
searchParam.documentation: Contact name

searchParam.name: cvrNumber
searchParam.documentation: Cvr number of the organization

searchParam.name: endpoint
searchParam.documentation: Technical endpoints providing access to services operated for the organization

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: Any identifier for the organization (not the accreditation issuer's identifier)

searchParam.name: municipalityCode
searchParam.documentation: Municipality code of the organization

searchParam.name: name
searchParam.documentation: A portion of the organization's name or alias

searchParam.name: partof
searchParam.documentation: An organization of which this organization forms a part

searchParam.name: phonetic
searchParam.documentation: A portion of the organization's name using some kind of phonetic matching algorithm

searchParam.name: providerIdentifier
searchParam.documentation: Provider identifier of the organization

searchParam.name: regionCode
searchParam.documentation: Region code of the organization

searchParam.name: source
searchParam.documentation: Source of the organization

searchParam.name: specialty
searchParam.documentation: Specialty of the organization

searchParam.name: type
searchParam.documentation: A code for the type of organization

searchParam.name: active
searchParam.documentation: Whether this practitioner's record is in active use

searchParam.name: date
searchParam.documentation: The period during which the practitioner is authorized to perform in these role(s)

searchParam.name: email
searchParam.documentation: A value in an email contact

searchParam.name: endpoint
searchParam.documentation: Technical endpoints providing access to services operated for the practitioner with this role

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: A practitioner's Identifier

searchParam.name: location
searchParam.documentation: One of the locations at which this practitioner provides care

searchParam.name: organization
searchParam.documentation: The identity of the organization the practitioner represents / acts on behalf of

searchParam.name: phone
searchParam.documentation: A value in a phone contact

searchParam.name: practitioner
searchParam.documentation: Practitioner that is able to provide the defined services for the organation

searchParam.name: role
searchParam.documentation: The practitioner can perform this role at for the organization

searchParam.name: service
searchParam.documentation: The list of healthcare services that this worker provides for this role's Organization/Location(s)

searchParam.name: specialty
searchParam.documentation: The practitioner has this specialty at an organization

searchParam.name: telecom
searchParam.documentation: The value in any kind of contact
